verses.verse: I will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> <S%H430>you,<s%> my God, the <S%H4428>King.<s%> I will <S%H1288>praise<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
Every <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H1288>praise<s%> <S%H1984>you.<s%> I will extol your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
<S%H1419>Great<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised!<s%> His <S%H1420>greatness<s%> is <S%H2714>unsearchable.<s%>
<S%H1755>One<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> will <S%H7623>commend<s%> your <S%H4639>works<s%> to <S%H5046>another,<s%> and will declare your mighty <S%H1369>acts.<s%>
Of the <S%H3519>glorious<s%> <S%H3519>majesty<s%> of your <S%H1926>honor,<s%> of your <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> <S%H1697>works,<s%> I will <S%H7878>meditate.<s%>
Men will <S%H559>speak<s%> of the <S%H5807>might<s%> of your awesome <S%H3372>acts.<s%> I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> your <S%H1420>greatness.<s%>
They will <S%H5042>utter<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of your <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> and will <S%H7442>sing<s%> of your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> <S%H7349>merciful,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and of <S%H1419>great<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H7356>all.<s%> His tender mercies are over all his <S%H4639>works.<s%>
All your <S%H4639>works<s%> will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh. Your <S%H2623>saints<s%> will extol <S%H1288>you.<s%>
They will <S%H559>speak<s%> of the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of your <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H1696>talk<s%> about your <S%H1369>power;<s%>
to make <S%H3045>known<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> his mighty <S%H1369>acts,<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3519>majesty<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%>

Your <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> is an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%> Your <S%H4475>dominion<s%> endures throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> Yahweh is faithful in all his words, and loving in all his deeds.
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5564>upholds<s%> all who <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and raises <S%H2210>up<s%> all those who are bowed <S%H3721>down.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all <S%H7663>wait<s%> for <S%H5414>you.<s%> You give them their <S%H400>food<s%> in due <S%H6256>season.<s%>
You <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of every living <S%H2416>thing.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H2623>gracious<s%> in all his <S%H4639>works.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to all those who <S%H7121>call<s%> on <S%H7121>him,<s%> to all who call on him in <S%H571>truth.<s%>
He will <S%H6213>fulfill<s%> the <S%H7522>desire<s%> of those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H8085>him.<s%> He also will hear their <S%H7775>cry,<s%> and will save <S%H3467>them.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8104>preserves<s%> all those who <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7563>him,<s%> but all the wicked he will <S%H8045>destroy.<s%>

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H8416>praise<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Let all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5703>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
